page.title: 17Chemical Industry
page.content: {Pentagon Chemicals:}Can be found on the Northside Industrial Estate and manufactures a range of Benzoate Salts, Esters and a number of other speciality chemicals for use in the food and soft drink industry, in antibiotic manufacture, preservatives, perfumes, hair condititioners, disinfectants, corrosion inhibitors and dye carriers. This recently established factory has been the centre of considerable controversy as the result of waste emmisions polluting the town with bad smells. {Cumbria Storage:}Located at the Port of Workington, Prince of Wales Dock has storage for 33,500 cu. metres of liquid sulphur, petroleum products and other chemicals.
